Articles.Content: i have unity but i don't know how to make the addons for kerbal space program

If you want to make part addons, you should learn a 3D modelling software, like Blender. Try to get used to how it works, and start with some basic models, which you then can improve. To get your parts in to the game you'll need Unity then. There are sone good tutorials for making part mods and how to set them up available here.

i have the actual unity software

Unity is just a tool to make a neat package out of what you have made, so that the game understands what you are delivering in what way. You will need a modelling program (like Blender) to actually make a part model, or an IDE (like Visual Studio with C++) to make code libraries.

i have blend so now what

Take a look at this link http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-NOW-WITH-TABLE-OF-CONTENTS

Also, youtube has a ton of resources on how to model, and texture, and do just about anything with Blender.

Good Luck!
